title: Presenting the Gazette Notification Published for amending the tax imposed on selected imported goods, in Parliament, for approval
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Ravi karunanayake, the Minister of Finance, to present 10 Gazette Notifications published amending the Special Commodity Levy imposed on identified essential goods imported to the country under the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 and the 02 Special Gazette Notifications issued under the Revenue Protection Act, No.19 of 1962, in Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet.
